name: mb-ai-tools
description: Personal Droid plugins by Marcel Bensch

plugins.name: droid-receipts
plugins.description: Generate visual receipts for Droid sessions with token breakdown and cost estimation

plugins.name: auto-worktrees
plugins.description: Automatically create and manage git worktrees for Droid sessions, isolating each session on its own branch

plugins.name: manual-worktrees
plugins.description: On-demand git worktree creation and cleanup via /worktree and /clean-worktrees commands

plugins.name: worktrees-skill
plugins.description: A skill for systematic git worktree management with smart directory selection and safety verification

plugins.name: jira-tools
plugins.description: Jira skills for managing tickets, creating stories, and filing bugs via Atlassian MCP tools
